quotes.text: Bitcoin is a technological tour de force.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: I think the internet is going to be one of the major forces for reducing the role of government. The one thing that's missing but that will soon be developed, is a reliable e-cash.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.text: Fix the money, fix the world.
quotes.author: Bitcoin Community

quotes.text: Bitcoin is a remarkable cryptographic achievement and the ability to create something that is not duplicable in the digital world has enormous value.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt
